body_html:
@bdaskalov With respect to the project I was using this feature in, my solution was simply to run so many epochs that I wouldn't possibly run into the bug (i.e., training took so long that I never reached the end---this was fine, since I was saving out the information I needed after each epoch; when it was time to wrap up the project, I simply took the latest information and used that).

As for the bug I reported in this issue, I have not found a solution.

As for the bug I reported in this issue, I have not found a solution.
body:
@bdaskalov With respect to the project I was using this feature in, my solution was simply to run so many epochs that I wouldn't possibly run into the bug (i.e., training took so long that I never reached the end---this was fine, since I was saving out the information I needed after each epoch; when it was time to wrap up the project, I simply took the latest information and used that).

As for the bug I reported in this issue, I have not found a solution.
